Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of circuit designs compared to design specifications.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Circuit Designs / Total Circuit Designs Reviewed) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.KPIS: Time to Market for Electrical Designs
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from initial electrical design concept to market launch.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: Total Time from Electrical Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the performance of electrical designs based on specified criteria (e.g., efficiency, reliability).
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: Average Performance Score of Electrical Designs

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for electrical design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: (Actual Electrical Design Cost / Budgeted Electrical Design Cost) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of electrical designs that require rework before final approval.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: (Number of Reworked Electrical Designs / Total Electrical Designs) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of electrical designs that pass all testing criteria.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Electrical Tests / Total Electrical Tests) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the overall quality of electrical designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Electrical Designs

Product Development+Engineering+Electric.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for electrical designs.
Product Development+Engineering+Electric.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Electrical Design / Number of Customers)
